docs.snippet: ON Sept. 19 McClure, Phillips Co. will begin their Autumn publishing season. They will issue then Albert Bigelow Paine's new book, "A Sailor of Fortune: Memoirs of Capt. B.S. Osbon." The Captain's life was full of adventure and incident.
docs.lead_paragraph: ON Sept. 19 McClure, Phillips Co. will begin their Autumn publishing season. They will issue then Albert Bigelow Paine's new book, "A Sailor of Fortune: Memoirs of Capt. B.S. Osbon." The Captain's life was full of adventure and incident.

headline.main: THE PUBLISHERS.; Beginning of the Autumn Season in the Trade -- Some of the New Books Nearly Ready.

docs.snippet: KANSAS CITY, Nov. 20. -- Before the Trans-Mississippi Commercial Congress to-night, Elihu Root, Secretary of State, delivered his second speech in this city within two days. As on Monday night, Secretary Root to-night dwelt on our relations with...
docs.lead_paragraph: KANSAS CITY, Nov. 20. -- Before the Trans-Mississippi Commercial Congress to-night, Elihu Root, Secretary of State, delivered his second speech in this city within two days. As on Monday night, Secretary Root to-night dwelt on our relations with South American republics, telling of his recent trip through those countries.
docs.abstract: Root s, Trans-Miss Commercial Cong; wants HR to pass ship subsidy bill to build up Amer merchant marine; text of s

headline.main: ROOT'S PLEA TO NATION FOR SHIP SUBSIDIES; Urges That Pressure Be Brought to Bear on Representatives. HARRIMAN ATTACKS RATE LAW Declares a Dangerous Power Has Been Given to Officials -- Answered by a Delegate.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Nov. 26. -- President Roosevelt returned to Washington at 10:42 o'clock to-night after a tour that included Panama and Porto Rico. The trip up the Potomac on the converted yacht Mayflower, to which he and his party were transferred from...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Nov. 26. -- President Roosevelt returned to Washington at 10:42 o'clock to-night after a tour that included Panama and Porto Rico. The trip up the Potomac on the converted yacht Mayflower, to which he and his party were transferred from the Louisiana at Piney Point this afternoon, was made without special incident.
docs.abstract: Pres returns; to send message on Canal to Cong

headline.main: PRESIDENT HOME AGAIN; TO SEND CANAL MESSAGE; Result of Trip Will Be a Special Communication to Congress. PLEASED WITH EVERYTHING The Ditch, Porto Rico, and the Navy Are Commended -- The Washington Crippled on the Trip.

docs.snippet: CINCINNATI, Dec. 9. -- Bellamy Storer to-night was told of the statement issued from the White House to-day denying that his correspondence had been made public there. His only answer was that the newspapers with one accord seemed to attribute the...
docs.lead_paragraph: CINCINNATI, Dec. 9. -- Bellamy Storer to-night was told of the statement issued from the White House to-day denying that his correspondence had been made public there. His only answer was that the newspapers with one accord seemed to attribute the publicity given the correspondence to the one source.

headline.main: STORER NOT CONVINCED.; Still Intimates That the White House Gave Out His Letter.

byline.original: Special to The New York Times
